description: QA grooming agent - issue is ready with testable requirements

test_strategy.approach: Integration tests for state machine transitions, unit tests for executors

test_cases.name: Grooming produces ready decision
test_cases.description: Verify issue transitions to groomed state when all agents agree

test_cases.name: Grooming produces needs_info decision
test_cases.description: Verify needs-info label is added when agents have questions

edge_cases: One agent fails while others succeed
